title: Поворот наоборот
overview: The famous singer, People's Artist of Russia Nikolai lives his stellar life, filled with interviews, love from fans and concerts. Tired of touring flights, one day Nikolai realizes that the world of glamor and luxury that surrounds him does not bring him joy at all. It seems to Nikolai that something went wrong in his life, he mentally returns to his childhood dreams. As a child, he wanted to become a pilot and felt boundless freedom. In life there is always a place for a miracle. Little pilot Kolya received a distress signal from the nostalgic Nikolai and landed to meet him...
